metro.GameScreen.CityView

Class CityTravelerSpot

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.GameScreen.CityView.CityTravelerSpot

  • public class CityTravelerSpot
extends java.lang.Object
    A traveler spot is a center where many people/traveler are. This will effect its environment so there are areas around it with a higher amount of traveler.
    Author:
    hauke

      • CityTravelerSpot

        public CityTravelerSpot(java.awt.Point position,
                int strength)
        Creates a new traveler spot on a specific position an with a certain strength.
        Parameters:
        position - Position of the center of the spot in pixel.
        strength - The strength (usually from 0 to 10).

    • Method Detail

      • isMouseInCircle

        public boolean isMouseInCircle(int layerIndex)
        Checks if mouse is in ONLY this circle or greater circles (but not in smaller/next ones).
        Parameters:
        layerIndex - The circle index.
        Returns:
        Boolean if mouse is in circle.

      • draw

        public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch sp,
        int layerIndex,
        boolean circleSelected,
        boolean onlyEdges)
        Draws the circles of the hot-spot.
        Parameters:
        sp - The SpriteBatch to draw on.
        layerIndex - Index of the circle to draw
        circleSelected - If the circle is selected and therefore drawn in a different color.
        onlyEdges - If only edges should be drawn
